body.name: Wireless Microphones, Metal UHF Dual Handheld Dynamic Mic System,Microfonos Inalambricos with Rechargeable Receiver,160ft Range,for Karaoke, Speech, Wedding, Church, PA System,Singing Machine
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 14 mins
features: 【High sound quality microphone】Built-in professional dynamic microphone (dB value: 95dB/audio signal sampling: 48 Khz) and noise reduction technology, which picks up clear, pure and full sound, It also reduces annoying background noise and maximizes the sound quality of your voice. The microphone is designed with alloy material, stronger and lighter for you to hold more comfortably. Suitable for karaoke, meeting, presentation, church, party and wedding.

【Up to 160 FT Wireless Range】The wireless microphone utilizes the latest connection technology to ensure a stable, fast connection without worrying about delays and interruptions. You need to make sure that the microphones are on separate channels when using the microphone, up to 8 microphones can be used together

【Plug and Play】Powering on the microphone and receiver will automatically pair them. Very convenient to use. Note: Only compatible with 3.5mm or 6.35mm "MIC" jacks, cannot be plugged into 'AUX' jacks. Compatible with Karaoke Machine, Audio Amplifier, Pa System, Mixer, Voice amplifier etc. But does not support Bluetooth, such as phones, computers, tablet

【Long hours of work & LCD Screen】The rechargeable microphone receiver can work for 4.5 hours and takes 2.5 hours for a full charge. Single microphone requires 2 AA alkaline batteries (included). You can view the connection and the connection channel and remaining power via the LED screen on the microphone. The case also includes a 3.5mm jack
【Satisfactory service】If you have any questions, please communicate with us and we will patiently answer your questions and do our best to satisfy you. We provide one year warranty

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compatible with variety of devices and convenient for you to sing Compatible with Karaoke Machine, Audio Amplifier, Pa System, Mixer, Voice amplifier etc. But does not support Bluetooth, such as phones, computers, tablets. Note: Only compatible with 3.5mm or 6.35mm jacks,not supported for Bluetooth connectionCan only be plugged into the "MIC" jack, not into the "AUX" jack.

A better experience springs from every detail 160FT stable and fast connection The wireless microphone utilizes the latest connection technology to ensure a stable, fast connection without worrying about delays and interruptions. Good Sound Quality Built-in professional dynamic microphone and noise reduction technology, which picks up clear, pure and full sound, It also reduces annoying background noise and maximizes the sound quality of your voice. Working LCD Display You can view the connection, connected channels, and remaining power through the LED screen on the microphone. 'CHA' and 'CHB' indicate that the microphones are on different channels, 'CH01' to 'CH08' indicate different frequencies

Rechargeable Receiver The rechargeable microphone receiver can work for 4.5 hours and takes 2.5 hours for a full charge. Single microphone requires 2 AA alkaline batteries (included). Automatic Connection Press and hold the microphone and wireless receiver power buttons until the indicator lights turn on, then the microphone will pair automatically.. Very convenient to use. NOT for Bluetooth This microphone utilizes UHF connection technology, which provides a longer range, more stable signal, and lower latency than a Bluetooth connection. So the microphone does not support Bluetooth connection devices. Such as phones, computers and tablets.
K206 UHF Microphones K207 UHF Microphones karaoke machine material Metal Metal Metal and Leather wireless distance 160FT 200FT Receiver use time 4 hour 8 hour Play music for 10 hours

Problem solving First, make sure that the microphone battery is charged and the microphone LCD display can be turned on. Secondly, To check the 2 microphone LCD screen, you need to make sure that the 2 microphones are on the "CHA" and "CHB" channels respectively. Lastly, Re-pairing the microphone and receiver: Turn off the microphone and receiver and unscrew the microphone battery cover.Then press and hold the power button and channel adjustment button at the same time until the antenna icon on the LCD screen flashes.Turn on the receiver microphone within 2 seconds. it will be re-paired successfully. How to adjusting the microphone 'CHA and CHB'： Turn on the microphone, unscrew the microphone battery cover Then press and hold the microphone power button and channel adjustment button (HILO) until the microphone displays CHA and CHB Press the Channel Adjustment button (HILO) 3 times to adjust the CHA and CHB channels.

Problem solving First, make sure that the microphone battery is charged and the microphone LCD display can be turned on. Secondly, To check the 2 microphone LCD screen, you need to make sure that the 2 microphones are on the "CHA" and "CHB" channels respectively. Lastly, Re-pairing the microphone and receiver: Turn off the microphone and receiver and unscrew the microphone battery cover.Then press and hold the power button and channel adjustment button at the same time until the antenna icon on the LCD screen flashes.Turn on the receiver microphone within 2 seconds. it will be re-paired successfully. How to adjusting the microphone 'CHA and CHB'： Turn on the microphone, unscrew the microphone battery cover Then press and hold the microphone power button and channel adjustment button (HILO) until the microphone displays CHA and CHB Press the Channel Adjustment button (HILO) 3 times to adjust the CHA and CHB channels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maybe a premature review but these are great
reviews.reviewText: These are great. Im not the karaoke guy so the kids have always been stuck with mics they think look good and want because the ad looks good which turn out to be the ones you have to yell into, are choppy, or just plainly don't work. These are non of those, and sound very professional. Really can not say enough good about these. One could argue that the mics use AA batteries but I actually am liking the fact that I can just run to the gas station and replace them rather than trying to source some proprietary rechargeable battery that is over priced. Great buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great once I got them paired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made quality
reviews.reviewText: Works as expected. Plug and play easy setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I had trouble pairing the 2 microphones at the same time and customer service kept helping until we found the problem. Very helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: K106: 160' range (high end not tested), 2 mics, 4 AA batteries, 1 USB-C/USB-A charging cable for base, 2 wind screens, 2 rings (to place mics onto/into, 1/4"-to-3.5mm audio adapter, user guide all included; only a handy carry case (to keep everything together, instead of my Ziploc bag) is missing. Insert batteries, charge base, plug base into amp, turn on, and sing away. Each mic is on a different channel, but you can't adjust the levels separately. You can change channels by unscrewing the battery cap and tapping the switch right or left; display shows channel and frequency. Black mic connects and sounds fine; red shows it's on but doesn't connect; no sound comes out. I tested the mics and base separately and together and cycled through all the channels. Would have awarded 5 stars if both mics worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great at my back patio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty great, for the price. Wireless= 10/10 sound= 6/10
reviews.reviewText: I have used much worse quality mics before. You will be able to achieve decent results, sonically.Connectivity is perfect. Features, convenience, and price add up to a great product. Are you getting a pro quality mic? No. But like I said, it's usable and cuts down on wires. Not bad sound quality, seriously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These Don't Work
reviews.reviewText: No matter what we did, we could not get these to connect or work. Very disappointed.
